title: URBANopt HVMV Substation
description: Schema for an URBANopt RNM HVMV Substation object

Code.description: Unique name/ID of the feature in the RNM analysis.

NodeA.description: Name/ID of the RNM 'From' Node it is associated with.

NodeB.description: Name/ID of the RNM 'To' Node it is associated with.

Xsc(pu).description: Reactance short-circuit (per unit). How much deviation per unit (multiplier).

TapMin.description: Tap minimum. How much the voltage value can be decreased (multiplier).

TapMax.description: Tap maximum. How much the voltage value can be increased (multiplier).

Subest.description: Substation the substation is connected to.

Feeder.description: Feeder the substation is connected to.
